attributes.action: Add pillows to the Azuma trains to improve the experience and comfort on train.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to improve the quality of experience on the Azuma. This will theoretically increase the use of the Azuma generating more profit on the long term. It will make customers come back again and exchange it for using cars that burn fossil fuels.
attributes.background: Add pillows to standard class to allow the traveler or commuter a better experience

rejection.details: Train companies are responsible for the facilities they provide to customers on their journeys, not the Government or Parliament.
